name: Garam Masala Spice Blend Recipe
description: This quick Garam Masala spice blend takes 2 mins to make at home with everyday spices. Use it in Indian dishes, with roasted veggies, in soups, stews, curries, cookies and more.

video.name: POTATO CAULIFLOWER CHICKPEA SALAD WITH VEGAN SOUR CREAM & ONION DRESSING | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
POTATO CAULIFLOWER CHICKPEA SALAD WITH VEGAN SOUR CREAM & ONION DRESSING

FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/potato-cauliflower-chickpea-salad-with/ 

SUBSCRIBE HERE: https://www.youtube.com/veganricharecipes?sub_confirmation=1

Summery Vegan Potato Salad with roasted potatoes, roasted Cauliflower, chickpeas and zucchini tossed in a vegan sour cream and onion dressing.

Potato Salads it seems like are a must for Summer BBQs and picnics. Instead of all the mayo that spoils up easily, here is a vegan sour cream version with tons of flavor. It also has cauliflower, chickpeas and zucchini and really can be the main if there is nothing else to eat :).

Another cauliflower recipe you say. Well you know roasted cauliflower is fabulous any time of the year. You can make this salad without the cauliflower too. Just Potatoes, chickpeas and zucchini in a creamy dressing. the bland summer potato salad, be gone! This Vegan potato salad has Roasted veggies and load of flavor! Potatoes and cauliflower are roasted to a crisp brown, the chickpeas and zucchini are roasted lightly to golden, tossed in dressing, topped with fresh herbs. 

******MORE SALAD RECIPES FROM THE BLOG******

SPICY BBQ CAULIFLOWER SALAD BOWL: https://www.veganricha.com/spicy-bbq-cauliflower-salad-bowl/

TUSCAN PASTA SALAD WITH LEMON VINAIGRETTE: https://www.veganricha.com/tuscan-pasta-salad-with-lemon-vinaigrette/

ROASTED BROCCOLI CAULIFLOWER SALAD WITH SUN-DRIED TOMATO DRESSING: https://www.veganricha.com/roasted-broccoli-cauliflower-salad-with-sun-dried-tomato-dressing/

recipeInstructions.text: Mix all the ingredients and store in an airtight container for upto 2 months.Add 1 bay leaf, powdered for variation.
